title: [Large-Scale] Developing a School Leadership Change Model Based on Professional Learning Communities: Innovation in Mathematics Education Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Pedagogy and Fundamental Understanding of School Organization Management
context.additional_context: Action research in a smartphone-based microlearning environment, focusing on developing a teacher-administrator collaborative leadership model.

learning_goals: Using a professional learning community (PLC) operational framework, learners can develop leadership change plans in three or more stages.
Applying action research methodologies, learners can design two or more math education leadership practice tasks within schools.
Learners can propose three or more communication strategies to align values among PLC members.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
